author: Mia De Graaf For Dailymail.Com
title: Why you should NEVER eat food past its sell-by date | Daily Mail Online
text: show ad Why you should NEVER eat food past its sell-by date: Old ingredients shorten your lifespan, study reveals Harvard University scientists have found mice fed older meat had a 13% shorter lifespan than those fed younger meat They claim it is because the set-in damage of the meat damaged the mice's cells Cellular damage is the reason we age, become weary and eventually die
